Author: davidw
Content: Ugh - I'd prefer reading what she has to say rather than be forced to watch the whole video.

Author: jsjenkins168
Content:
Not useless, but just a headache to do well. There are some badass applications written in Java ME.

You have to be very organized with your builds if you need to utilize many optional libraries b/c phone support can be splotchy at best. Fortunately many of the important libraries such as MMAPI and PDA are commonplace with new phones.

Author: imsteve
Content:
This just in: marriage is no party.

There was a similar study with more interesting results that you can actually act on. It found that having a more attractive woman as a partner (even if she is only attractive with makeup) causes men to have higher testosterone from day to day. Just the sight of her will affect your body.

Hmm.
